law.catch_line: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated....

text.section: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Chief Executive Officer" means the Chief Executive Officer of Maryland Correctional Enterprises.

"Contracting unit" means a unit of State government that is:
authorized to contract for goods and services; or
responsible for procurement of goods and services.
"Management Council" means the Maryland Correctional Enterprises Management Council.
"Political subdivision" means a county, municipal corporation, or special taxing district.
